ActivityNode.Notes: You can't just query to find the most recent AS number, the AS number isn't an incrementing digit, it's something that is managed by the core routing team. This value needs to be supplied as an input variable.

ResultMessage.FormattedCode: Tenant query failed with VNMC error {0} : {1}

ActivityNode.Notes: For example, if request URL is not correct, response may be: "Invalid application name:<invalid-relative-url-provided>, please make sure URL format is correct."

Configuration.Description: It extract the first node of BGB, response is alreday sorted in descending order.
